<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o nsamp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ; slightly adapted example from Jonathan Murphy Dec 2006
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifn = p4 ; table number ilen = nsamp(ifn) prints "actual numbers of samples = %d\n", ilen itrns = 1 ; no transposition ilps = 0 ; loop starts at index 0 ilpe = ilen ; ends at value returned by nsamp above imode = 1 ; loops forward istrt = 0 ; commence playback at index 0 samples ; lphasor provides index into f1 alphs lphasor itrns, ilps, ilpe, imode, istrt atab tablei alphs, ifn outs atab, atab
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 262144 1 "kickroll.wav" 0 4 1 ;stereo file in table, with lots of zeroes f 2 0 262144 1 "fox.wav" 0 4 1 ;mono file in table, with lots of zeroes
i1 0 10 1 i1 + 10 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
